verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> vay-Hi came דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- And the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. came unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man שִׂ֤ים <WH7760> sim set פָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha thy face אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- toward גּוֹג֙ <WH1463> goyG against Gog אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz the land הַמָּג֔וֹג <WH4031> ham-ma-Gog, of Magog נְשִׂ֕יא <WH5387> ne-Si prince רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> rosh the chief מֶ֣שֶׁךְ <WH4902> Me-shech of Meshech וְתֻבָ֑ל <WH8422> ve-tu-Val; and Tubal וְהִנָּבֵ֖א <WH5012> ve-hin-na-Ve and prophesy עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lav. against

וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> ve-'A-mar-ta, And say כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD הִנְנִ֤י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> 'e-Lei-cha I am against גּ֔וֹג <WH1463> Gog, Behold I [am] against thee O Gog נְשִׂ֕יא <WH5387> ne-Si prince רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> rosh the chief מֶ֥שֶׁךְ <WH4902> Me-shech of Meshech וְתֻבָֽל׃ <WH8422> ve-tu-Val. and Tubal

וְשׁ֣וֹבַבְתִּ֔יךָ <WH7725> ve-Shoav-Ti-cha, And I will turn thee back וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti and put חַחִ֖ים <WH2397> cha-Chim hooks בִּלְחָיֶ֑יךָ <WH3895> bil-cha-Yei-cha; into thy jaws וְהוֹצֵאתִי֩ <WH3318> ve-ho-tze-Ti and I will bring thee forth אוֹתְךָ֨ <WH853> 'ot-Cha וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all חֵילֶ֜ךָ <WH2428> chei-Le-cha and all thine army סוּסִ֣ים <WH5483> su-Sim horses וּפָרָשִׁ֗ים <WH6571> u-fa-ra-Shim, and horsemen לְבֻשֵׁ֤י <WH3847> le-vu-Shei all of them clothed מִכְלוֹל֙ <WH4358> mich-lOl with all sorts כֻּלָּ֔ם <WH3605> kul-Lam, all קָהָ֥ל <WH6951> ka-Hal company רָב֙ <WH7227> rav [of armour even] a great צִנָּ֣ה <WH6793> tzin-Nah [with] bucklers וּמָגֵ֔ן <WH4043> u-ma-Gen, and shields תֹּפְשֵׂ֥י <WH8610> to-fe-Sei all of them handling חֲרָב֖וֹת <WH2719> cha-ra-Vot swords כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> kul-Lam. all

פָּרַ֛ס <WH6539> pa-Ras Persia כּ֥וּשׁ <WH3568> kush Ethiopia וּפ֖וּט <WH6316> u-Fut and Libya אִתָּ֑ם <WH854> 'it-Tam; for כֻּלָּ֖ם <WH3605> kul-Lam all מָגֵ֥ן <WH4043> ma-Gen with them all of them with shield וְכוֹבָֽע׃ <WH3553> ve-cho-Va'. and helmet

גֹּ֚מֶר <WH1586> Go-mer Gomer וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all אֲגַפֶּ֔יהָ <WH102> 'a-gap-Pei-ha, and all his bands בֵּ֚ית <WH1004> beit the house תּֽוֹגַרְמָ֔ה <WH8425> to-gar-Mah, of Togarmah יַרְכְּתֵ֥י <WH3411> yar-ke-Tei quarters צָפ֖וֹן <WH6828> tza-Fon of the north וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אֲגַפָּ֑יו <WH102> 'a-gap-Pav; and all his bands עַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim people רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> rab-Bim [and] many אִתָּֽךְ׃ <WH854> 'it-Tach. for

הִכֹּן֙ <WH3559> hik-Kon Be thou prepared וְהָכֵ֣ן <WH3559> ve-ha-Chen and prepare לְךָ֔ le-Cha, אַתָּ֕ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all קְהָלֶ֖ךָ <WH6951> ke-ha-Le-cha for thyself thou and all thy company הַנִּקְהָלִ֣ים <WH6950> han-nik-ha-Lim that are assembled עָלֶ֑יךָ <WH5921> 'a-Lei-cha; about וְהָיִ֥יתָ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yi-ta become לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem לְמִשְׁמָֽר׃ <WH4929> le-mish-Mar. unto thee and be thou a guard

מִיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> mi-ya-Mim days רַבִּים֮ <WH7227> rab-Bim After many תִּפָּקֵד֒ <WH6485> tip-pa-Ked thou shalt be visited בְּאַחֲרִ֨ית <WH319> be-'a-cha-Rit in the latter הַשָּׁנִ֜ים <WH8141> hash-sha-Nim years תָּב֣וֹא׀ <WH935> ta-Vo thou shalt come אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- into אֶ֣רֶץ׀ <WH776> 'E-retz into the land מְשׁוֹבֶ֣בֶת <WH7725> me-sho-Ve-vet [that is] brought back מֵחֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> me-Che-rev, from the sword מְקֻבֶּ֙צֶת֙ <WH6908> me-kub-Be-tzet [and is] gathered מֵעַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> me-'am-Mim people רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> rab-Bim, out of many עַ֚ל <WH5921> 'al unto הָרֵ֣י <WH2022> ha-Rei against the mountains יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which הָי֥וּ <WH1961> ha-Yu had been לְחָרְבָּ֖ה <WH2723> le-cha-re-Bah waste תָּמִ֑יד <WH8548> ta-Mid; which have been always וְהִיא֙ <WH1931> ve-Hi he מֵעַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> me-'am-Mim out of the nations הוּצָ֔אָה <WH3318> hu-Tza-'ah, but it is brought forth וְיָשְׁב֥וּ <WH3427> ve-ya-she-Vu and they shall dwell לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> la-Ve-tach safely כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> kul-Lam. all

וְעָלִ֙יתָ֙ <WH5927> ve-'a-Li-ta Thou shalt ascend כַּשֹּׁאָ֣ה <WH7722> kash-sho-'Ah like a storm תָב֔וֹא <WH935> ta-Vo, and come כֶּעָנָ֛ן <WH6051> ke-'a-Nan thou shalt be like a cloud לְכַסּ֥וֹת <WH3680> le-chas-Sot to cover הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz the land תִּֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh; become אַתָּה֙ <WH859> 'at-Tah you וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all אֲגַפֶּ֔יךָ <WH102> 'a-gap-Pei-cha, thou and all thy bands וְעַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> ve-'am-Mim people רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> rab-Bim and many אוֹתָֽךְ׃ <WH854> o-Tach. for ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; GOD וְהָיָ֣ה׀ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah will come בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom It shall also come to pass [that] at the same time הַה֗וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, he יַעֲל֤וּ <WH5927> ya-'a-Lu come דְבָרִים֙ <WH1697> de-va-Rim shall things עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- into לְבָבֶ֔ךָ <WH3824> le-va-Ve-cha, into thy mind וְחָשַׁבְתָּ֖ <WH2803> ve-cha-shav-Ta and thou shalt think מַחֲשֶׁ֥בֶת <WH4284> ma-cha-She-vet thought רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> ra-'Ah. an evil

וְאָמַרְתָּ֗ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta, And thou shalt say אֶֽעֱלֶה֙ <WH5927> 'e-'e-Leh I will go up עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz to the land פְּרָז֔וֹת <WH6519> pe-ra-Zot, of unwalled villages אָבוֹא֙ <WH935> a-Vo I will go הַשֹּׁ֣קְטִ֔ים <WH8252> hash-Sho-ke-Tim, to them that are at rest יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei that dwell לָבֶ֑טַח <WH983> la-Ve-tach; safely כֻּלָּ֗ם <WH3605> kul-Lam, all יֹֽשְׁבִים֙ <WH3427> yo-she-Vim all of them dwelling בְּאֵ֣ין <WH369> be-'Ein without חוֹמָ֔ה <WH2346> cho-Mah, without walls וּבְרִ֥יחַ <WH1280> u-ve-Ri-ach and having neither bars וּדְלָתַ֖יִם <WH1817> u-de-la-Ta-yim nor gates אֵ֥ין <WH369> 'ein and having לָהֶֽם׃ <WH99999> la-Hem.

לִשְׁלֹ֥ל <WH7997> lish-Lol To take שָׁלָ֖ל <WH7998> sha-Lal a spoil וְלָבֹ֣ז <WH962> ve-la-Voz and to take בַּ֑ז <WH957> Baz; a prey לְהָשִׁ֨יב <WH7725> le-ha-Shiv to turn יָדְךָ֜ <WH3027> ya-de-Cha thine hand עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against חֳרָב֣וֹת <WH2723> cho-ra-Vot upon the desolate places נוֹשָׁבֹ֗ת <WH3427> no-sha-Vot, [that are now] inhabited וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and against עַם֙ <WH5971> 'am and upon the people מְאֻסָּ֣ף <WH622> me-'us-Saf [that are] gathered מִגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> mig-go-Yim, out of the nations עֹשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> 'o-Seh which have gotten מִקְנֶ֣ה <WH4735> mik-Neh cattle וְקִנְיָ֔ן <WH7075> ve-kin-Yan, and goods יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei that dwell עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against טַבּ֥וּר <WH2872> tab-Bur in the midst הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. of the land

שְׁבָ֡א <WH7614> she-Va Sheba וּ֠דְדָן <WH1719> U-de-don and Dedan וְסֹחֲרֵ֨י <WH5503> ve-so-cha-Rei and the merchants תַרְשִׁ֤ישׁ <WH8659> tar-Shish of Tarshish וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol all כְּפִרֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH3715> ke-fi-Rei-ha with all the young lions יֹאמְר֣וּ <WH559> yo-me-Ru thereof shall say לְךָ֔ le-Cha, הֲלִשְׁלֹ֤ל <WH7997> ha-lish-Lol to take שָׁלָל֙ <WH7998> sha-Lal prey אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah have you בָ֔א <WH935> Va, unto thee Art thou come הֲלָבֹ֥ז <WH962> ha-la-Voz to take בַּ֖ז <WH957> baz plunder הִקְהַ֣לְתָּ <WH6950> hik-Hal-ta assemble קְהָלֶ֑ךָ <WH6951> ke-ha-Le-cha; thy company לָשֵׂ֣את׀ <WH5375> la-Set to carry כֶּ֣סֶף <WH3701> Ke-sef silver וְזָהָ֗ב <WH2091> ve-za-Hav, and gold לָקַ֙חַת֙ <WH3947> la-Ka-chat to take away מִקְנֶ֣ה <WH4735> mik-Neh cattle וְקִנְיָ֔ן <WH7075> ve-kin-Yan, and goods לִשְׁלֹ֖ל <WH7997> lish-Lol to take שָׁלָ֥ל <WH7998> sha-Lal prey גָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> ga-Dol. a great ס sa-Mek

לָכֵן֙ <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore הִנָּבֵ֣א <WH5012> hin-na-Ve prophesy בֶן־ <WH1121> ven- Therefore son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta and say לְג֔וֹג <WH1463> le-Gog, unto Gog כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> Yah-weh; GOD הֲל֣וֹא׀ <WH3808> ha-Lo not בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom In that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu, he בְּשֶׁ֨בֶת <WH3427> be-She-vet dwelleth עַמִּ֧י <WH5971> 'am-Mi when my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לָבֶ֖טַח <WH983> la-Ve-tach safely תֵּדָֽע׃ <WH3045> te-Da'. shalt thou not know

וּבָ֤אתָ <WH935> u-Va-ta And thou shalt come מִמְּקֽוֹמְךָ֙ <WH4725> mi-me-kom-Cha from thy place מִיַּרְכְּתֵ֣י <WH3411> mi-yar-ke-Tei parts צָפ֔וֹן <WH6828> tza-Fon, out of the north אַתָּ֕ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you וְעַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> ve-'am-Mim people רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> rab-Bim thou and many אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> 'it-Tach; for רֹכְבֵ֤י <WH7392> ro-che-Vei with thee all of them riding סוּסִים֙ <WH5483> su-Sim upon horses כֻּלָּ֔ם <WH3605> kul-Lam, all קָהָ֥ל <WH6951> ka-Hal company גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> ga-Dol a great וְחַ֥יִל <WH2428> ve-Cha-yil army רָֽב׃ <WH7227> Rav. and a mighty

וְעָלִ֙יתָ֙ <WH5927> ve-'a-Li-ta And thou shalt come up עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against עַמִּ֣י <WH5971> 'am-Mi against my people יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כֶּֽעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> ke-'a-Nan as a cloud לְכַסּ֣וֹת <WH3680> le-chas-Sot to cover הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; the land בְּאַחֲרִ֨ית <WH319> be-'a-cha-Rit it shall be in the latter הַיָּמִ֜ים <WH3117> hai-ya-Mim days תִּֽהְיֶ֗ה <WH1961> tih-Yeh, shall come וַהֲבִאוֹתִ֙יךָ֙ <WH935> va-ha-vi-'o-Ti-cha and I will bring עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- against אַרְצִ֔י <WH776> 'ar-Tzi, thee against my land לְמַעַן֩ <WH4616> le-ma-'An so דַּ֨עַת <WH3045> Da-'at may know הַגּוֹיִ֜ם <WH1471> hag-go-Yim that the heathen אֹתִ֗י <WH853> 'o-Ti, בְּהִקָּדְשִׁ֥י <WH6942> be-hik-ka-de-Shi me when I shall be sanctified בְךָ֛ <WH99999> ve-Cha לְעֵינֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5869> le-'ei-nei-Hem before their eyes גּֽוֹג׃ <WH1463> Gog. in thee O Gog ס sa-Mek

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> 'a-do-Nai the Lord יְהוִ֗ה <WH3069> Yah-weh GOD הַֽאַתָּה־ <WH859> ha-'at-tah- are you ה֨וּא <WH1931> hu the one אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- of whom דִּבַּ֜רְתִּי <WH1696> dib-Bar-ti [Art] thou he of whom I have spoken בְּיָמִ֣ים <WH3117> be-ya-Mim time קַדְמוֹנִ֗ים <WH6931> kad-mo-Nim, in old בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> be-Yad by עֲבָדַי֙ <WH5650> 'a-va-Dai my servants נְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> ne-vi-'Ei the prophets יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel הַֽנִּבְּאִ֛ים <WH5012> han-nib-be-'Im which prophesied בַּיָּמִ֥ים <WH3117> bai-ya-Mim in those days הָהֵ֖ם <WH1992> ha-Hem those שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> sha-Nim; [many] years לְהָבִ֥יא <WH935> le-ha-Vi that I would bring אֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> 'o-te-Cha עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem. against ס sa-Mek
